bordered.description: Quick way to set a 1 pixel thick border that varis its color on each side. The color value goes in a clockwise order: top, right, bottom, left

drop-shadow.description: Adds a box-shadow that is semi-transparent black. The first two values control the x and y axis position, the third controls blur (how big the shadow is), and the final value is the opacity (0 is fully transparent, 1 is opaque).
